# TestTrait

**Protocol**

A protocol describing a trait that you can add to a test function.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol TestTrait : Trait
```

## Overview

The testing library defines a number of traits that you can add to test functions. You can also define your own traits by creating types that conform to this protocol, or to the [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/SuiteTrait] protocol.

## Creating custom traits

- **Trait**: A protocol describing traits that can be added to a test function or to a test suite.
- **SuiteTrait**: A protocol describing a trait that you can add to a test suite.
- **TestScoping**: A protocol that tells the test runner to run custom code before or after it runs a test suite or test function.

## Inherits From

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- Trait

## Conforming Types

- Bug
- Comment
- ConditionTrait
- IssueHandlingTrait
- ParallelizationTrait
- Tag.List
- TimeLimitTrait
